YunBan project management system

YunBan project management system is a system used to manage the projects of YunBan better.It is also used to control the display of projects showed in company's projects showcase page.

Users can use this system to find the projects more efficiently.Users can search items according to the following keywords:the style of the page,category of projects,recommendation rate,customers.

It can be searched for the projects according to different search requirements.
